title: Enhancing protein aggregation prediction: a unified analysis leveraging graph convolutional networks and active learning
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,31439-31450
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA06285J, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Jiwon Sun, JunHo Song, Juo Kim, Seungpyo Kang, Eunyoung Park, Seung-woo Seo, Kyoungmin Min
A graph convolution neural network (GCN) model was developed to predict the aggregation propensity of human protein. The model was applied to protein structures derived from the AlphaFold 2.0 dataset, demonstrating its ability to accurately assess protein aggregation of human protein structure.
